00056 template<unsigned DIM>
00057 class GeneralisedLinearSpringForce : public AbstractTwoBodyInteractionForce<DIM>
00058 {
00059     friend class TestForces;
00060 
00061 private :
00062 
00064     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00071     template<class Archive>
00072     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00073     {
00074         // If Archive is an output archive, then '&' resolves to '<<'
00075         // If Archive is an input archive, then '&' resolves to '>>'
00076         archive & boost::serialization::base_object<AbstractTwoBodyInteractionForce<DIM> >(*this);
00077         archive & mMeinekeSpringStiffness;
00078         archive & mMeinekeDivisionRestingSpringLength;
00079         archive & mMeinekeSpringGrowthDuration;
00080     }
00081 
00082 protected:
00083 
00091     double mMeinekeSpringStiffness;
00092 
00100     double mMeinekeDivisionRestingSpringLength;
00101 
00108     double mMeinekeSpringGrowthDuration;
00109

00111

00136                                                               unsigned nodeBGlobalIndex,
00137                                                               AbstractCellPopulation<DIM>& rCellPopulation,
00138                                                               bool isCloserThanRestLength);
00139 
00153     c_vector<double, DIM> CalculateForceBetweenNodes(unsigned nodeAGlobalIndex,
00154                                                      unsigned nodeBGlobalIndex,
00155                                                      AbstractCellPopulation<DIM>& rCellPopulation);
00159     double GetMeinekeSpringStiffness();
00160

00165
